text: Kaistia adipata is a bacterium from the genus of Kaistia which has been isolated from soil near the Chung-Ju industrial complex in Korea. ==References== == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Kaistia adipata at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhizobiaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Kaistia adipata
